source_credibility.title: Source Credibility Database
source_credibility.description: Evaluate sources before citing. Credibility is Faytuks' only asset.

tier_1.name: Gold Standard
tier_1.description: Can cite without additional verification. Established track record, transparent methodology.
tier_1.confidence: High - single source sufficient for factual claims

tier_2.name: Reliable
tier_2.description: Generally accurate but verify significant claims with second source.
tier_2.confidence: Medium-High - prefer corroboration for major claims

tier_3.name: Use with Caution
tier_3.description: May have bias or accuracy issues. Always corroborate.

tier_4.name: Unreliable / Propaganda
tier_4.description: Known disinformation or regime-aligned. Do not cite as fact. May cite to debunk.
tier_4.confidence: None - never cite as reliable source

iran_human_rights_ihrngo.name: Iran Human Rights (IHRNGO)
iran_human_rights_ihrngo.notes: Norway-based. Gold standard for death tolls. Verifies before publishing. Mahmood Amiry-Moghaddam leads.

hengaw.name: Hengaw Organization for Human Rights
hengaw.notes: Kurdish-focused but covers all Iran. Excellent on-ground network in Kurdistan and northern Iran.
weaknesses: Kurdistan focus means less coverage elsewhere

hrana.name: Human Rights Activists News Agency
hrana.notes: Inside Iran network. Detailed arrest documentation.
weaknesses: Network inside Iran means some risk of regime penetration

amnesty_international.name: Amnesty International
amnesty_international.notes: Global organization. Slower but very thorough.

iran_international.name: Iran International
iran_international.notes: London-based Persian/English news. Fast, good sources, but Saudi-linked funding raises questions for some.

bbc_persian.name: BBC Persian
bbc_persian.notes: BBC editorial standards. Trusted inside Iran.

radio_farda.name: Radio Farda (RFE/RL)
radio_farda.notes: US-funded but editorial independence. Good verification.
weaknesses: US funding can be used against it by regime

manoto.name: Manoto TV
manoto.notes: Persian entertainment and news. Popular but less journalistic rigor.

verified_journalists.notes: Individual journalists with track record. Verify independently for major claims.

anonymous_accounts.notes: May have inside access but unverifiable. Never sole source.
anonymous_accounts.use: Lead for investigation only, never cite directly

diaspora_activist_accounts.notes: Passionate but may amplify unverified claims.

irna.name: IRNA (Islamic Republic News Agency)
irna.notes: State news agency. Propaganda. Cite only to debunk or show regime position.

press_tv.name: Press TV
press_tv.use_for: Never cite as fact. May cite to show regime narrative.

known_disinfo_accounts.notes: Accounts known for spreading false information
known_disinfo_accounts.action: Block, do not engage, do not amplify

telegram_unverified.notes: Anonymous Telegram channels without track record
telegram_unverified.action: Never cite. May use as lead for investigation.

verification_workflow.step_2_tier_2: Corroborate major claims with second source
verification_workflow.step_2_tier_4: Do not cite as fact. Only to debunk.
verification_workflow.step_3: Check for recent corrections or controversies with source
verification_workflow.step_4: When in doubt, wait for better sourcing

red_flags: Single anonymous source for major claim
Claim perfectly fits narrative (too good to check)
Breaking news from account with no track record
